page.title: 17RECREATION IN ASHILL
page.content: Sport plays a prominent part in village life. The{Football}Club runs two Saturday sides. The 1st team in the Anglian Comb. Div 4 and the 2nd in the Dereham and Dist. League Div 2.The {Netball}Club has 2 sides and this year the 1st team won the West Suffolk League Div 3.{Badminton}is played in the Community Centre.The{Sports {Assoc.}is the umbrella organisation for football, netball and badminton and raises funds etc. There is an {Outdoor Bowling}Green and an{Indoor {Bowling}Green at the Leisure Centre (Old Hall) both have teams competing in the Norfolk E.B.A. competitions. At the Leisure Centre are two{Squash courts. Four teams (3 mens, 1 ladies) play in the Norfolk Leagues, also two {Snooker}tables are available for hire. Both the Leisure Centre and White Hart P.H. have{Darts}and{Cribbage}teams.
